long_description: A sunny-day essential with a chic frame, the Pepper's Wanda Sunglasses shelter your eyes with glare-cutting polarized lenses. Triacetate polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement, for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Shiny Black frames feature polarized green lenses. Tortoise frames feature polarized brown lenses. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection.
short_description: A sunny-day essential with a chic frame, the Pepper's Wanda Sunglasses shelter your eyes with glare-cutting polarized lenses.
